name: frontend-brm-gulp

scripts.finalizar: rm publication/*.html && rm publication/css/style.css && mv publication/js/libs/ publication/ && rm publication/js/*.js && mv publication/libs publication/js && gulp libs && gulp css && gulp minicss && gulp js && gulp js:ugly && gulp views && rm publication/**/concat.**.** && rm publication/css/style.css &&rm -R publication/maps && gulp limpiar
